pages.about: About Green Valley Golf Club - Experience Excellence in Golfing greenvalley@gmail.com Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, India Home About us Our experts Contacts Our Story Discover Green Valley Our Story Exploring our Golf Club Welcome to the world of Green Valley Golf Club, where every swing tells a story of passion and dedication. Situated amidst breathtaking natural landscapes, our club offers a haven for golf enthusiasts of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting your golf journey, Green Valley provides state-of-the-art facilities and expert coaching to help you hone your skills. Immerse yourself in the camaraderie and excitement of the game as you tee off on our meticulously manicured courses. Join us at Green Valley and experience the thrill of golf in its purest form. Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance of Green Valley Golf Club. Our club is more than just a golf destination—it's a retreat for the mind, body, and soul. Indulge in the serene beauty of our lush fairways as you embark on a golfing adventure like no other. With top-notch amenities and personalized service, we strive to exceed your expectations at every turn. Whether you're seeking relaxation or a competitive challenge, Green Valley has something for everyone. Come discover the magic of golf at Green Valley and make memories that will last a lifetime. At Green Valley Golf Club, we believe that every golfer deserves the opportunity to reach their full potential. That's why we offer a comprehensive range of programs and services designed to elevate your game. From group lessons to private coaching, our experienced instructors are here to guide you every step of the way. Whether you're aiming to improve your swing or master the art of putting, our tailored approach ensures that you receive the attention and support you need to succeed. Join us at Green Valley and unlock your true golfing potential. About Our Club Welcome to Green Valley Experience the epitome of excellence at Green Valley Golf Club. Nestled amidst stunning landscapes, our club offers a sanctuary for golf enthusiasts of all levels. From our meticulously crafted courses to our world-class facilities, immerse yourself in an unparalleled golfing experience. 15+ Years of Experience 400+ Active Members 40+ Expert Coaches 12+ Award Winning The Excellence of Our Golf Facilities Dive into the world of golfing excellence at Green Valley Golf Club. Discover unparalleled facilities and services tailored to elevate your golfing experience to new heights. State-of-the-art golf courses Premium membership options Award-winning coaching staff Our Golf Experts Meet Our Dedicated Professionals Dive into the world of golf excellence with our team of dedicated professionals. Each member brings a wealth of experience and expertise to ensure an exceptional golfing experience for all our members. HOWARD COOK Anabelle Lopez Misty Peterson Larry Klark Common Inquiries Answers to Your Questions Have questions about our golf club? Find answers to commonly asked questions below. How do I join Green Valley Golf Club? + Joining Green Valley Golf Club is easy! Simply visit our website and fill out the membership application form. Our team will review your application and get in touch with you shortly. How can I cancel my membership? + If you wish to cancel your membership, please contact our membership services team via email or phone. They will guide you through the cancellation process. What benefits do members receive? + Members of Green Valley Golf Club enjoy exclusive access to our premium facilities, discounted rates on golf equipment and apparel, invitations to members-only events, and much more. Our Golf Facilities Explore Our Amenities Discover the exceptional facilities offered at Green Valley Golf Club, designed to enhance your golfing experience. Expert Training Our club offers top-notch training facilities, including a practice tee for warm-up sessions and a pro shop stocked with premium gear. Exclusive Membership Experience the benefits of exclusive club membership, with access to our training facilities and pro shop. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Green Valley Golf Club greenvalley@gmail.com Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, India Home About us Our experts Contacts Information page Privacy Policy Privacy Policy: Our Privacy Policy outlines the information we collect, how it is used, and the measures we take to safeguard your data. Data Collection: We collect various types of information, including personal data, when you interact with our website or services, such as when you register for membership, make reservations, or contact us. Information Usage: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations. Third-Party Access: We may share your information with third-party service providers for purposes such as website hosting, payment processing, and analytics. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information. Data Security: We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. Children's Privacy: Our website and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. Consent: By using our website or services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. Policy Changes: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website. Access and Control: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of certain data processing activities, such as marketing communications. Data Retention: We retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. International Transfer: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your jurisdiction, where data protection laws may differ. By using our website or services, you consent to such transfers. Legal Disclosure: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to legal process, such as a court order or subpoena. Links to Other Sites: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites and encourage you to review their privacy policies. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or practices, please contact us at greenvalley@gmail.com. Compliance: We are committed to complying with applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for users in the European Economic Area (EEA). User Responsibilities: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and ensuring the security of your information while using our website or services. Effective Date: This Privacy Policy is effective supersedes any prior versions. Golf Club Green Valley Experience the pinnacle of golfing excellence amidst the breathtaking landscapes of India. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Green Valley Golf Club greenvalley@gmail.com Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, India Home About us Our experts Contacts Information page Terms and Conditions Terms and Conditions: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of Green Valley Golf Club's website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these terms. Acceptance of Terms: By accessing or using our website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using our website. Membership: Membership privileges are subject to approval and may be revoked or suspended at any time without prior notice. Members are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials. Reservations: Tee time reservations are subject to availability and must be made in advance. Members may be required to pay applicable fees for reservation changes or cancellations. Code of Conduct: Members and guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful manner at all times. Any behavior deemed inappropriate or disruptive by club management may result in disciplinary action, including expulsion. Payment and Fees: Members are responsible for paying all applicable fees and charges associated with their membership and use of club facilities. Failure to make timely payments may result in suspension or termination of membership. Use of Facilities: Members and guests are granted access to club facilities for recreational purposes only. Commercial use or solicitation is strictly prohibited without prior authorization from club management. Liability: Green Valley Golf Club is not liable for any personal injury, property damage, or loss incurred while using club facilities. Members and guests assume all risks associated with their participation in club activities. Intellectual Property: The content, design, and branding of our website are protected by intellectual property laws and may not be reproduced or used without permission. Modification of Terms: Green Valley Golf Club reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website. Termination: Green Valley Golf Club reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website and services for any reason, including violation of these Terms and Conditions. Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms and Conditions shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the laws of India. Severability: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Waiver: The failure of Green Valley Golf Club to enforce any provision of these Terms and Conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such provision or any other provision herein. Entire Agreement: These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and Green Valley Golf Club regarding your use of our website and services, superseding any prior agreements or understandings. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at greenvalley@gmail.com. Effective Date: These Terms and Conditions are effective remain in effect until modified or updated by Green Valley Golf Club.
